title: Best Ayurvedic Hospital in India | Nagarjuna Ayurveda Centre Kerala
description: Nagarjuna Ayurveda is the best traditional ayurvedic hospital in Kerala, India. Nagarjuna Hospital provides best treatment for Back pain, Psoriasis, skin diseases, Paralysis etc.
cleaned_text: For authentic & scientific ayurveda Nagarjuna has developed speciality protocols and adopted integrated and holistic approaches "to improve the quality of life of ailing population".
